name: Saul
description: First king of Israel, tallest man in the nation. Began with promise but descended into jealousy and madness as David's star rose. Died tragically on Mount Gilboa. The king who had everything but couldn't hold it.

tormented-throne.name: Tormented on Throne
tormented-throne.description: Sitting on throne but consumed by dark thoughts
tormented-throne.prompt: seated on throne but hunched with inner torment - crown heavy on head, eyes dark and suspicious, the king consumed by jealousy rather than enjoying his reign, evil spirit tormenting him

throwing-spear.name: Throwing Spear at David
throwing-spear.description: The moment of attempted murder - rage unleashed
throwing-spear.prompt: hurling spear with full force - face twisted with rage, arm extended in throw, the king trying to kill the one he fears, jealousy turned to violence

crowned-king.name: Crowned King
crowned-king.description: The moment of anointing - before the fall
crowned-king.prompt: standing tall receiving crown or newly crowned - head and shoulders above others, the moment of promise before everything went wrong, regal and hopeful

consulting-witch.name: Witch of Endor
consulting-witch.prompt: kneeling or bowing before witch in dark cave - the mighty king reduced to seeking forbidden counsel, desperation in his posture, the low point before the end

fallen-gilboa.name: Fallen on Gilboa
fallen-gilboa.description: The tragic end - falling on his own sword
fallen-gilboa.prompt: falling upon sword on battlefield - the tragic end of the first king, choosing death over capture, Mount Gilboa around him, sons fallen nearby

watching-david.name: Watching David's Rise
watching-david.description: Observing from shadows as David is celebrated
watching-david.prompt: standing in shadow watching celebration in distance - the king observing David being praised, bitter jealousy consuming him, crown feeling heavier, the watcher being replaced
